hackathon-description-text: You have the chance to disrupt travel at

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best project by small team as determined by judges
Best project by large team as determined by judges
Best project as determined by vote of developers

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the project truly an original and unique approach to solving one of more of the four THack travel challenges? If the project is a more incremental invention, how does it compare in originality compared to other projects in the hackathon? (25% of score)
Does the project meet the intent or spirit of at least one of the four travel challenges? (25% of score)
Does the project use working code and rise to the level of a prototype product or tool as a digital travel application? (25% of score)

Is the project's purpose and functionality clearly presented by the individual or team? Is the premise, business case and/or solution easily understood in its scope and potential growth? (25% of score)

hackathon-description-header: Join 100+ developers and leading travel companies Lufthansa, GetYourGuide and Sabre ... change the face of travel ... and win more than €5,000 in cash and travel prizes.
